DOC.brief_summary: Study Design : - A single center , open , randomize , single dose , two-period , two-treatment , two-sequence , crossover study Primary Objective : - To assess bioequivalence combination oral formulation amlodipine/losartan versus two co-administered product contain amlodipine losartan
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Amlodipine Plus Losartan Versus Amlodipine Losartan
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary Objective : - To evaluate safety tolerability formulation .
DOC.criteria: Age 1855 year Healthy Caucasian volunteer Non smoker mild smoker Exclusion criterion : Pregnancy and/or breastfeed Participation another clinical trial within 60 day prior Period 1 .
